Thunderstorm: Rhesus, I am detecting Mutate somewhere near. Mustex, 
I'll take Gorzo as my escort.

He transforms to robot mode, and, as sonn as he touches the ground, 
back to chopper mode. He opens his cockpit for Gorzo to hop in.

Thunderstorm: Get in Gorzo, and strap yourself. It's going to be some 
fast ride!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Spotting him and bored out of his skull Transmutate landed.
> 
> Mutate: Grettings Maximal I am Transmutate of the Geotrons.
>

his

the
